articles.title: SAM rainmaker Iqbal Khan takes 20-strong M&A group to JSA | Asian Legal Business - Legal Business Online
articles.description: Indian law firm J. Sagar Associates has poached a team of around 20 M&A lawyers from Shardul Amarchand Mangaldas & Co led by rainmaker Iqbal Khan. They constitute some of JSA’s most prominent lateral hires in what has already been a frantic year of recruitmen…
